# Overview
This is not actually a lesson, but it will probably become a lesson over time (as I add more material to this). For now, this "chapter" will simply be helpful links to get you started with Git and GitHub.


## Reading, Videos, and Assignments

- Watch: no video at this time
- Read and Do (a bunch of stuff from Jenny Bryan's **Happy Git with R**; these chapters are really short):  
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/big-picture.html>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct.html>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/shell.html#shell>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/hello-git.html>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/ssh-keys.html>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/push-pull-github.html>
    + <https://happygitwithr.com/rstudio-git-github.html>
